entries.title: The One
entries.content: He turned in the research paper on Friday; otherwise, he would have not passed the class. I honestly find her about as intimidating as a basket of kittens.
entries.attachment1: It's never comforting to know that your fate depends on something as unpredictable as the popping of corn.
entries.attachment2: It isn't true that my mattress is made of cotton candy. It took him a while to realize that everything he decided not to change, he was actually choosing. He had a wall full of masks so she could wear a different face every day. I've traveled all around Africa and still haven't found the gnu who stole my scarf.

entries.title: Abc v. 123
entries.content: Let me help you with your baggage. Courage and stupidity were all he had.
entries.attachment1: I really want to go to work, but I am too sick to drive.
entries.attachment2: The furnace repairman indicated the heating system was acting as an air conditioner.

entries.title: You won't believe it
entries.content: I love eating toasted cheese and tuna sandwiches. Random words in front of other random words create a random sentence.
entries.attachment1: The clouds formed beautiful animals in the sky that eventually created a tornado to wreak havoc.
entries.attachment2: Her life in the confines of the house became her new normal. He was the type of guy who liked Christmas lights on his house in the middle of July.
